text: Boaz gaa hana gi di gowaa hai dagabuli i di bontai di abaaba di waahale, gaa noho gi lala i golo, gei tuaahina hoohoo a Elimelech, go taane dela nogo helekai ai Boaz, ga hanimoi laalaa, gei Boaz gaa gahi a mee, “Haele mai, noho gi lala, dogu ihoo haga tenetene.” Gei taane deelaa gaa hana, gaa noho gi lala.
